nodes.name: Cholesterol
nodes.clinical_relevance_notes: Enhances uptake of contaminants into the membrane of the BBB.

nodes.name: Protein
nodes.clinical_relevance_notes: Inhibits uptake of contaminants into the membrane of the BBB.

nodes.label: neurological disorders
nodes.notes: Potentially attributed to MNP contamination in brain tissue.

nodes.assumptions_notes: Assumes particles can cross the BBB.

nodes.label: transport through blood-brain barrier
nodes.notes: Transport depends on the biomolecular corona.

nodes.name: Polystyrene
nodes.notes: Commonly used model plastic for studying transport through membranes.
Sample collected from mice after gavage.
